name: KAIJU BATORU
description:
We're a team of two (artist and programmer) making a game for the first time. We had no experience making pixel art or using Godot before this, so it was a great opportunity to learn! If our game entertains you for even a minute, we'll be happy :)

Thanks for trying our game!

Credits:

  • Music by Kubbi: https://kubbimusic.com/
  • Font by videodante:https://videodante.itch.io/tinypixel
  • Sound effects from Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets
